DOC.criteria: Age 18 year old Patients document coronary artery disease Current treatment dose aspirin daily minimum 3 month Able provide write informed consent base competent mental status Myocardial infarction , unstable angina stroke precede three month Platelet count < 125,000/mm Known haematological disorder Active malignancy current chemotherapy recent diagnosis cancer
